definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Carbohydrate counting can help you choose what and how much to eat.
sentences.chinese: 糖类计算法可帮助您选择所吃的食物和份量。

sentences.english: Feed be- tween half and a complete jar before baby's milk feed.
sentences.chinese: 在宝宝喝奶前进食半樽至一樽的份量。

sentences.english: Experiment with your food intake to determine the optimum size meal to have in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 你的饮食经验决定了晚餐最适的食物份量。

sentences.english: You know best "role models" of weight.
sentences.chinese: 你最清楚“为人师表”的份量。

sentences.english: At the end of the competition, Kobayashi had finished five bowls and a total of two kilograms of mutton to take the championship.
sentences.chinese: 比赛结束，小林尊以五碗二公斤的份量勇夺冠军。

sentences.english: Open coconut milk, put a little (around 5 table spoons) on the heating pan.
sentences.chinese: 开棷奶罐，倒约5茶匙份量的棷奶在热锅上。

sentences.english: Eat smaller portions and avoid second helpings .
sentences.chinese: 吃小份量的餐并避免吃第二份。

sentences.english: Under no circumstances should you eat the vegetables, as they contain dangerous amounts of butt-blasting fibre.
sentences.chinese: 万万别吃，因为内含的有毒纤维份量足以造成肛裂。

sentences.english: You shouldn apos teat too much stodge in your diet .
sentences.chinese: 你在饮食控制中，不应该吃太多份量重的东西。

sentences.english: You shouldn't eat too much stodge in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你在饮食控制中，不应该吃太多份量重的东西。

sentences.english: What`s a degree`s weight in the present job market?
sentences.chinese: 在如今的工作市场上，学历的份量到底有多重？

sentences.english: He measured out the right quantity of medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他配出了适当份量的药。

sentences.english: For accurate measurement of the amount of bleach added a tablespoon or measuring cup can be used.
sentences.chinese: 可用汤匙及量杯准确地量度所需漂白水的份量。

sentences.english: If they don't want to lose face, the gifts should not be too cheap.
sentences.chinese: 假如自己不想丢脸，那送出的礼物份量可不能太轻。

sentences.english: Made with the same ingredients as Shrimp-egg noodles deluxe but with less shrimp roe.
sentences.chinese: 虾子的份量比金方虾子面略少，味道清甜。

sentences.english: Adding corn flour sauce with water may help decrease the amount of oil used when cooking.
sentences.chinese: 用少量生粉和水作芡汁可减少烹调时的用油份量。

definition: carrying pole and the loads on it/burden/task/responsibility/CL:副[fu4]
standard weight (used on a balance scale)
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
